response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. We understand its significance to you, given your discerning taste and appreciation for quality. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $750,000, a generous discount that reflects our commitment to making such unparalleled excellence accessible to those who truly appreciate it. We believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both parties to benefit. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this masterpiece into your collection.", "product_price": 750000}
